definition: to remain/to be left/to have as remainder
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
leftovers from a meal/fig. remnants handed down from others

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 sheng4 yu2 ding4 li3

definition: "leftover woman" (successful career woman who has remained single)

sentences.english: There was only one scorpion. But the sting was in the tail.
sentences.chinese: 只剩一只蝎子了，但是刺却在尾巴上。

sentences.english: What remains of IndyMac's franchise is of questionable value , to put it charitably .
sentences.chinese: 怜悯的说，因地美特许权价值还剩几许值得怀疑，。

sentences.english: At his death, he had lost about a third of his weight and had only a few dollars.
sentences.chinese: 他死时，体重锐减约三分之一，而且身上只剩几文钱。

sentences.english: Bridges water side, leaving only a broken-hearted song in monopoly Wandering Road.
sentences.chinese: 小桥流水边，只剩断肠人在望断天涯路。

sentences.english: No food was left in the pantry except some bread.
sentences.chinese: 食品柜里除了一些面包其它什么也不剩。

sentences.english: The last 4 times decimation was achieved by two half-band filters and a droop FIR.
sentences.chinese: 剩馀4倍抽取采用两级半带滤波器和升幅FIR实现。

sentences.english: A big bear hugged one and then there were two.
sentences.chinese: 一只大熊抓走一个还剩两个。

sentences.english: The dog was so hungry that he left next to nothing in his food bowl.
sentences.chinese: 那只狗饿得把碗里的食物吃得几乎不剩。

sentences.english: Now there are 7 Chinese sturgeons left which the park originally received from the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 大陆共赠港10条国宝级的中华鲟，现在剩7条。

sentences.english: You should eat up every grains of rice in your bowl.
sentences.chinese: 你应将碗中的米饭吃得一粒不剩。

sentences.english: Remember the five-day rule for leftovers, too.
sentences.chinese: 对剩饭菜请同样谨记五天原则。

sentences.english: After that we tried to fill the remaining big cavities in the color space.
sentences.chinese: 之后我们尝试填入色彩空间的剩馀大凹处。

sentences.english: One got in chancery, and then there were four.
True to my prediction, in the afternoon I ran to the park. There was nothing left but the tender twigs.
sentences.chinese: 果不出所料，下午再跑到公园，只剩嫩枝了。

sentences.english: The Decade on behalf of the twenty-first century, leaving only the 2010 has.
sentences.chinese: 二十一世纪的一十年代，只剩这个2010年了。

definition: to be dead/not to be, or cease to exist
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
full to the point of bursting/(coll.) at most
to collect all the bits to make a whole
